manzils.text: Kba-pha, sapata sanmanita kora'anara
baram sihamte bismita haiche ye, sihamtara majara paraa'i ejana satarkakarai sihamtara ocarata ahiche; arau kaphirasakale kaya, ‘e'om dekhuna eta bismayakara bastu!’
‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima arau matita parainata hama tathapi'o (ami punaraut'thita hamane?), E'i pratyarartana suduraparaahata!’
Arasye ami jano matiye sihamtaka kimana ksaya karae arau amara ocarata ache samyaka samraksanakarai kitaba
Prakrtate sihamtara ocarata satya ahara pichata sihamte seya asbikara karaiche. Eteke sihamta sansayayukta bisayata nipatita
Sihamte sihamtara oparata arasthita akasara pine laksya nakarae neki, kenekai ami seya nirmana karaicho arau iyaka susobhita karaicho arau tata kono dharanara phata'o mela na'i
arau ami prthiraika bistrta karaicho arau tata sthapana karaicho parbatamala. Lagate tata utpanna karaicho nayana praitikara sakalo prakarara udbhida
allahara anuraagi pratyeka bandara babe jnana arau upadesasbaraupa
Arau akasara paraa barsana karao ami kalyanamaya pani. Tara pichata tara dbaraa utpanna karao baga-bagica arau kartanayogya sasyadana
Arau okha okha khejura gacha, ya’ta ache oparaa-oparaikai lagi thaka khejurara joka
bandasakalara jiraikasbaraupa. Amiye'i panira dbaraa sanjiraita karao mrta caharaka; e'idarae'i ut'thana ghatiba
Sihamtara purbe'o satyaka asbikara karaichila nuhara sampradaye, raa’chara adhibasi arau chamuda sampradaye'o
ada, phira'a'una arau luta sampradaye'o
Lagate a'ikara adhibasi arau tubba sampradaye, sihamta sakalorae asbikara karaichila raachulasakalaka. Phalata sihamtara oparata amara sasti yatharthabharae apatita haichila
Ami prathamabara srsti karaiye'i klanta haicho neki! Baram natuna srstira bisaye sihamta sandehata patita
Arasye ami manuhaka srsti karaicho arau tara prabrttiye taka yi kumantrana diye se'ito'o ami jano; arau ami tara gharara dhamanitakaiyo adhika ocarata
Yetiya tara somphale arau ba'omphale baha dujana phiraista'i parasparae (tara amala) lipibad'dha karaibalai grahana karae
Si yi katha'i uccarana nakaraka kiya tara ocarata sadaya upasthita ache samraksanakarai
Arau samcakaiye mrtyu yantrana yathayatha bharae ahi pale. E'itorae'i se'ito, yitora paraa tumi palayana karaiba bicaraichila
Arau sinata phum diya ha’ba. E'itorae haiche pratisrauta dina
Arau se'idina pratijana byakti upasthita ha’ba, tara lagata thakiba ejana calaka arau ejana saksi
Arasye e'i dina samparke tumi udasina achila, tara pichata amiye tomara sanmukhara paraa parda unmocana karaicho. Phalata aji tomara drsti ati prakhara
Arau tara sangiye (phiraista'i) ka’ba, ‘eya mora ocarata amalanama prastuta
Adesa karaa ha’ba, tomaloka ubhaye jahannamata niksepa karaa pratyeka ud'dhata kaphiraka
kalyanakara kamata prabala badha pradanakarai, simalanghanakarai arau sandeha posanakarai
Yiye allahara lagata anaka ilaharaupe grahana karaichila, tomaloke taka kathina sastita niksepa karaa
Tara sangi cayatane ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Ma'i taka bidraohi karai tola nachilo. Baram si nije'i achila ghora bibhraanta’
Allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke mora sanmukhata baka-bitanda nakaraiba, ma'i tomalokaka agate'i satarka karaichilo
Mora ocarata katha paraibartana nahaya arau ma'i bandasakalara prati an'yayakarai'o nahaya
Se'idina ami jahannamaka sudhima, ‘tumi paraipurna haichane’? Jahanname ka’ba, ‘arau kiba achene’
arau jannataka muttakbisakalara nikatararti karaa ha’ba, kono duratba nathakiba
Iyarae pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila. Pratyekajana allaha abhimukhi, samraksanasilasakalara babe
yisakale nedekhakai rahamanaka bhaya karaichila arau binita citte upasthita haiche
Te'omlokaka koraa ha’ba, ‘santira saite tomaloke tata praraesa karaa; e'itorae ananta jiranara dina’
Tata te'omloke yito kamana karaiba se'itorae paba, lagate amara ocarata ache arau adhika

Arau ami sihamtara purbe bahu prajanmaka dhbansa karaicho, yisakala sakti-samarthara ksetrata achila ihamtatakai adhika prabala, sihamte desa-bidese ghurai phuraichila; tathapi'o sihamtara kono palayanasthala achilane barau
niscaya iyata upadesa ache tara babe, yara ache antahkarana athaba yiye manoyoga sahakarae srarana karae
Arau arasye ami akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo srsti karaicho kerala chaya dinata; arau amaka kono klanta'i sparsa karaa na'i
Eteke sihamte yi kaya se'i bisaye tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau tomara pratipalakara saprasansa paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa suryodaya horaara agata arau suryasta yoraara agata
lagate te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa raatira ekansata arau chalatara pichata
Manoyoga sahakarae suna, yidina ejana ghosanakaraiye nikatararti sthanara paraa ahbana karaiba
se'idina sihamte samcakaiye sunibalai paba bikata cinamra, se'i dinatorae'i punaraut'thanara dina
Niscaya amiye'i jirana dana karao arau amiye'i mrtyu ghata'om, arau amara phale'i (sakalorae) pratyarartana
Yidina sihamtara paraa prthiraikhana bidirna ha’ba, arau manuhe kharadharakai lara maraiba, e'itorae enekuraa eta samabesa yito amara babe ati sahaja
Sihamte yi kaya seya ami bhalakaiye jano, arau sihamtaka badhya karaoraa tomara kama nahaya; seye yiye amara sastika bhaya karae taka tumi kora'anara sahayata upadesa diya
Sapata dhuli urauraa'i niya batahara
tara pichata panira boja bahanakarai meghamalara
tara pichata mrdugatita bai yoraa nauyanasamuhara
tara pichata (allahara) nirdesa bantanakarai phiraistasakalara
tomalokaka diya pratisrauti arasye satya
Niscaya pratidana dirasa arasyambharai
Sapata bahu patha bisista akasara
niscaya tomaloka paraspara biraodhi kathata lipta
Birata rakha haya tara paraa yiye birata thake
Michaliyasakala dhbansa ha'omka
yisakala sandeha-sansayata nipatita, udasina
Sihamte sodhe, ‘pratidana dirasa ketiya ha’ba’
‘yidina sihamtaka ju'ita sasti diya ha’ba’
Koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke tomalokara sasti bhoga karaa, iyara babe'i tomaloke kharadhara karaichila’
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatasamuhata arau nijaraa prabahita sthanata
te'omlokarara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi dana karaiba seya te'omloke anandacitte grahana karaiba; niscaya itipurbe e'omloka achila satkarmasila
raatira ati kama samaya te'omloke topanita kata'ichila
arau raatira sesa praharata te'omloke ksama praarthana karaichila
arau te'omlokara dhana-sampadata achila bhikharai arau bancitasakalara haka
Arau suniscita bisbasisakalara babe prthiraita bahuto nidarsana ache
arau tomalokara nijara majato ache. Tomaloke laksya nakaraa neki
arau akasata ache tomalokara jiraika arau pratisrauti diya sakalo bastu
Eteke akasa arau prthiraira pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya e'ito parama satya yenekai tomalokara katha koraato satya
Ibraahimara sanmanita atithira brttanta tomara ocarata ahichene
yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata ahile arau ka'le, ‘chalama’, uttarata teraom ka'le ‘chalama’. E'omloka dekhuna acinaki
Tara pichata te'om drautabharae gopane nija grhinira ocaralai ga’la arau eta sbasthabana go-poraali (bhaja) lai upasthita ga’la
tara pichata te'om se'ito te'omlokara sanmukhata raakhi ka’le, ‘aponaloke nakhaya neki’
phalata te'omlokara bisaye te'omra manata bhitira sancara ha’la. Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakaraiba’; arau te'omloke te'omka ejana jnani putra santanara susambada dile
Tetiya te'omra strai cinamrai cinamrai aguraa'i ahile arau nijarae mukhata thaparaiya'i ka’le, brd'dha-bandhya (ra santana ha’ba)
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘tomara pratipalake e'itorae kaiche; niscaya te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna’
Ibraahime ka’le, ‘he praeraita phiraistasakala! Tomalokara bisesa kama ki’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya ami eta aparaadhi sampradayara prati praeraita haicho’
Sihamtara oparata paka matira tukuraa niksepa karaibalai
yito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa cihnita simalanghanakaraisakalara babe
Arau tata yisakala mumina achila ami sihamtaka uliya'i anicho
Kintu ami tata eta paraiyalara bahirae ana kono muchalima poraa na'i
Arau yisakale yantranadayaka sastika bhaya karae ami sihamtara babe tata eta nidarsana thai ahicho
Arau muchara kahinito nidarsana ache, yetiya ami te'omka suspasta pramanasaha phira'a'unara ocarata pathiya'ichilo
kintu si ksamatara ahankarata mukha ghuraa'i la’le arau ka’le, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’
Phalata ami taka arau tara sain'ya bahinika sasti bihilo arau sihamtaka sagarata niksepa karailo arau si achila tiraskrta
Arau nidarsana ache ada sampradayara ghatanato, (smarana karaa) yetiya ami sihamtara biraud'dhe akalyanakara bataha praerana karaichilo
se'i batahajaka ekorae eraa nachila, yara oparaedi gaichila taka curna-bicurna karai gaichila
Arau nidarsana ache chamuda sampradayara ghatanato, yetiya sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘eta nirdista samaya laike bhoga karai loraa’
Kintu sihamte sihamtara pratipalakara adesa manibalai ahankara karaile; phalata sihamta ca'i thaka arasthate sihamtaka bajrapate dharaile
Phalata sihamte thiya ha’balaike'o saksama naha’la arau pratiraodho karaiba noraaraile
Arau (dhbansa karaichilo) iyara agata nuhara sampradayaka, niscaya sihamta achila phachikba sampradaya
Arau ami amara ksamatara balata akasa nirmana karaicho arau niscaya ami mahasamprasaranakarai
Arau ami prthiraikhanaka parai dicho, (coraacona, ami) kimana sundara byarasthapanakarai
arau ami pratito bastu yoraa yoraa srsti karaicho, yate tomaloke upadesa grahana karaa
Eteke tomaloke allahara phale dharaita horaa, niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai
Arau tomaloke allahara lagata ana kono ilaha nirdharana nakaraiba; niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai
E'idarae sihamtara purbarartisakalara majata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche, sihamte'i kaiche, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’
Sihamte ijane sijanaka e'i bisaye achiyata karaiche neki? Baram sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa, tomara kono dosa naha’ba
Arau tumi upadesa di thaka, karana niscaya upadesa muminasakalara upakarata ahe
Arau ma'i jina arau manuhaka kerala e'i babe'i srsti karaicho ye, sihamta kerala morae'i ibadata karaiba
Ma'i sihamtara paraa kono jiraika nibicarao arau ma'i e'ito'o nibicarao ye, sihamte moka khuraaba
Niscaya allahe'i jiraikadata, prabala saktidhara, paraakramasali
Eteke yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache sihamtara samamatalambisakalara darae praapya (sasti); gatike sihamte kharakheda karaiba nalage
Eteke yihamte kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe se'idinara dhbansa, yi dinatora bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haiche
Sapata tura parbatara
sapata kitabara yito lipibad'dha ache
unmukta patata
Sapata abada grhara
sapata su'ucca cadara
sapata taranga-biksubdha uttala sagarara
niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti arasyambharai
iyara pratiraodhakarai kono na'i
Yidina prabalabharae akasakhana prakampita ha’ba
arau parbatasamuha drautagatita paraibhramana karaiba
eteke sarbanasa se'idina asbikarakaraisakalara babe
yihamte khela-dhemalira chalanarae asara karmata lipta thake
Se'idina sihamtaka jahannamara ju'ira phale theli-heci lai yoraa ha’ba
‘e'itorae se'i jahannama yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’
E'ito yadu neki? Ne tomaloke dekha noporaa
Tomaloke ju'ita praraesa karaa, tara pichata tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa ba nakaraa ubhaye'i tomalokara babe samana. Tomaloke yi karaichila tarae'i pratiphala tomalokaka diya haiche
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau praacuryara bhitarata
te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi pradana karaiche seya te'omloke upabhoga karaiba arau te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka raksa karaiba jbalanta agnira sastira paraa
‘tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’
Te'omloke sraenibad'dhabharae susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba; arau ami te'omlokara milana ghatama mrganayani danara caku bisista hurara lagata

arau yisakale imana aniche arau te'omlokara santana-santati'o imanata te'omlokara anugami haiche, ami te'omlokara lagata te'omlokara santana-santatika ekatraita karaima, arau te'omlokara karmaphala ami alapo hraasa nakaraima; pratyeka byaktiye'i nija krtakarmara babe dayi
Arau ami te'omlokaka atiraikta pradana karaima phala-mula arau mansa yito te'omloke kamana karaiba
Tata te'omloke parasparae panapatra adana-pradana karaiba, tata kono nirarthaka katha-bataraa nathakiba arau kono papa kama'o nathakiba
Arau tata te'omlokara seraata carai'ophale ghurai thakiba kisorasakalara dala; sihamta dekhata yena suraksita mukuta
Arau te'omloke ijane sijanara phale ca'i sudhiba
te'omloke ka’ba, ‘niscaya ami iti purbe amara paraiyala bargara majata sankita arasthata achilo’
Tara pichata allahe amara prati anugraha karaiche arau amaka ju'ira sastira paraa raksa karaiche
Niscaya ami agate'o te'omke'i ahbana karaichilo; niscaya te'om krpamaya, parama dayalu
Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya
Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho
Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’
Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba
Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae
Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara
Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra
Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’
Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba
Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba
Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane

Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara sid'dhantara oparata dhairya dharana karaa; karana tumi amara cukura sanmukhate acha. Tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansara saite paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa yetiya tumi thiya horaa
Arau te'omra paraitrata ghosana karaa nisara bhagata arau taraabora astamita horaara pichata
Sapata naksatrara, yetiya i astamita haya
tomalokara sangi bibhraanta horaa na'i, arau bipathagami'o nahaya
arau te'om mane saja katha nakaya
Eya kerala ahi, yito te'omra prati ahiraupe praerana karaa haya
te'omka siksa diche prabala saktidhara
saundaryapurna satta. Tara pichata te'om sthira haichila
arau te'om achila urd'dhadigantata
tara pichata te'om nikatararti ha’la, eteke nikatararti ahila
phalata te'omra majata dukhana dhenura duratba ra’la, athaba tatokai kama
Tetiya allahe te'omra bandara prati yi ahi karaibalagiya seya ahi karaile
Yi te'om dekhiche, te'omra antarae se'i samparke micha koraa na'i
te'om yi dekhiche, se'i samparke tomaloke te'omra lagata bitarka karaiba neki
arau niscaya te'om te'omka arau ebara dekhichila
Chidaraatula munatahara ocarata
yara ocarata jannatula ma’oraa arasthita
Yetiya chidaraa'i yi acchadita karaara seya acchadita karaichila
te'omra drsti bibhrama horaa na'i, arau sima'o atikrama karaa na'i
Niscaya te'om nija pratipalakara mahana nidarsanaralira kichumana dekhichila
eteke tomaloke lata arau ujjha samparke ki koraa
arau trtiya ana eta manata samparke
eya ki katha, tomalokara babe putra arau arau allahara babe kan'ya santana
teneha’le eya eta asangata bantana

E'ibora kichumana namara bahirae ana eko nahaya, yibora nama tomaloke arau tomalokara pitrpurausasakale raakhiche, yara samarthanata allahe kono dalila-pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Sihamte kerala anumana arau nijara prabrttirae'i anusarana karae, athaca sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa hidayata ahiche
Manuhe yi bicarae se'itorae si paya ne
prakrtate akhiraata arau duniya allaharae'i
Arau akasasamuhata asankhya phiraista ache, sihamtara madhyasthata kono kamata nahiba, kintu allahe yaka iccha karae arau yara prati te'om santusta haya tara babe anumati diyara pichata
Niscaya yihamte akhiraataka bisbasa nakarae, sihamte'i phiraistasakalaka naraibacaka namerae namakarana karae
athaca e'i bisaye sihamtara kono jnane'i na'i. Sihamta kerala anumanara anusarana karae; arau niscaya anumana satyara mukabilata kono kamata nahe
Eteke tumi se'i byaktika upeksa karaa, yiye amara smaranara paraa bimukha haya arau akala prthiraira jiranake'i kamana karae
E'itorae sihamtara jnanara sesa sima. Niscaya tomara pratipalaka, teraemi ata'itakai bhala jane kona te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche arau teraemi bhala jane kona hidayatapraapta haiche

Arau akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache sakalo allaharae'i. Yate te'om sihamtara kamara pratiphala diba parae yihamte beya kama karae arau yate se'isakala lokaka uttama puraskara diba parae yisakale satkarma karae

yisakale sarau-suraa dosa-trautira bahirae danara danara papa arau aslila karyakalapara paraa birata thake. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ksama aparaisima; te'om tomalokara bisaye samyaka aragata—(smarana karaa) yetiya te'om tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaichila arau yetiya tomaloka matrgarbhata bhraunaraupe achila. Eteke tomaloke atmaprasansa nakaraiba, kone takbaraa aralambana karaiche se'i bisaye teraemi samyaka aragata
Tumi se'i byaktika dekhichane, yiye mukha ghuraa'i laiche
arau kincita dana karaile arau bandha karai dile
tara ocarata kiba gayebara jnana ache neki, yito si pratyaksa karae
ne muchara chahiphata yi ache, se'i samparke taka arahita karaa horaa na'i
arau ibraahimara chahiphata, yijane purna karaichila (te'omra angikara)
seya haiche ye, kono boja bahanakaraiye anara boja bahana nakaraiba
arau e'i ye, manuhe se'itorae paya, yito si cesta karae
arau tara pracestara phala atisighrae'i dekhuraa ha’ba
tara pichata taka purna pratiphala pradana karaa ha’ba
arau niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i haiche sesa gantabya
arau niscaya teraemi hahuraaya arau teraemi kanduraaya
arau niscaya teraemi mrtyu pradana karae arau teraemi jirana dana diye
arau niscaya teraemi srsti karaiche yora-yorakai purausa arau narai
sukrabindura paraa, yetiya i skhalita haya
arau niscaya punaraut'thana ghatoraara dayitba'o te'omrae'i
arau niscaya teraemi abharamukta karae arau sampada pradana karae

Arau teraemi praacina ‘ada jatika dhbansa karaiche
arau chamuda jatiko (dhbansa karaiche). Sihamtara ejanako arasista rakha na'i
Arau iyara purbe nuhara sampradayako (teraemi dhbansa karaiche). Niscaya sihamta achila atisaya yalima arau carama abadhya
Arau teraemi olota'i diya abasabhumika niksepa karaichila
tara pichata se'ito acchanna karaichila yi acchanna karaibalagiya achila

Kiyamata nikatararti
Allahara bahirae kone'o iyaka prakasa karaibalai saksama nahaya
Tomaloke e'i kathata bismaya bodha karaicha neki
arau hamhi-thatraa karaicha! Kanda na'i
arau tomaloke udasina
eteke tomaloke allahaka chajada karaa arau te'omra ibadata karaa
Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’
Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba
Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i
Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
apamanita aranamita nayanerae se'idina sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta pharainahe
sihamte ahbanakaraira phale bhita-santrasta arasthata guci ahiba. Kaphirasakale ka’ba, ‘e'ito bara kathina dina’
Ihamtara purbe nuhara sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila-- eteke sihamte amara bandaka asbikara karaichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana baliya’, arau te'omka bhiti pradarsana karaa haichila
Tetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i asahaya, eteke tumiye'i iyara pratisodha grahana karaa’
Phalata ami dharaasara barasunasaha akasara duraarasamuha khuli dilo
arau matira paraa jharnasamuha utsaraita karailo; phalata gote'i pani milita ha’la eta paraikalpana anusarae
Arau ami taka (nuhaka) katha arau peraeka nirmita nauyanata araohana karaalo
Yito amara cakura sanmukhata calichila, e'ito puraskara tara babe yaka pratyakhyana karaa haichila
Arau niscaya ami iyaka nidarsanaraupe raakhi dicho; eteke achene konoba upadesa grahanakarai
eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
ada sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila, eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata pathiya'ichilo pracanda sitala dhumuha nirabicchinna amangala dinata
se'i dhumuha'i manuhaka utkhata karaichila, yena sihamta ughali paraa khejura gachara kanda
Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
chamuda sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila
Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami amara majarae'i ejana byaktira anusarana karaima neki? Eneha’le ami pathabhrastatata arau unmattatata patita hama
Amara majara paraa e'omra prati upadesabani praerana karaa haiche neki? Nahaya, si ejana michaliya, dambhika’
Ahakali niscaya sihamte gama paba, kona carama michaliya, dambhika
Niscaya ami sihamtara babe paraiksasbaraupa uta patha'i acho, eteke tumi sihamtara bisaye apeksa karaa arau dhairyadharana karaa
Arau sihamtaka jana'i diya ye, sihamtara majata pani bantana sunirdista. Pratyeke'i nijara pala mate panira ansata upasthita ha’ba
Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara sangika mati anile arau si utajanika dharai hatya karaile
Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
niscaya ami sihamtara prati pathiya'ichilo eta pracanda sabda, phalata sihamta gohali saja sukana khandita kharaira darae hai ga’la
Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene

Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata sila bahanakarai pracanda dhumuha pathiya'ichilo, kerala luta paraiyalara bahirae; te'omlokaka ami ud'dhara karaichilo raatira sesansata
amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa. Yiye krtajnata prakasa karae, ami taka enekaiye pratidana di'om
Arau niscaya lute sihamtaka amara kathina sastira paraa satarka karaichila, tathapi'o sihamte saradhana bani samparke sandeha posana karaichila

Arau niscaya puraa dokamukalite sihamtara oparata biraamahina sasti nami ahichila

E'ito srstijagatara pratipalakara paraa aratirna
Tathapi'o tomaloke e'i banika tuccha buli bhabicha neki
arau tomaloke asbikara karaake'i tomalokara jiraika karai laicha
eteke kiya nahaya—praana yetiya kanthagata haya
